name: Lucky Pusher Spin
description:
Lucky Pusher Spin is a simple but classic coin push game, you can have unlimited fun and also get some reward. Now come and get this pusher party started!

How to play:
1. Click and drop coins
2. Push the coins and make them drop in the bucket
3. Collect the coins and win the reward!
4. Use special to get more coins!
5. Use the wall to protect items on board!
Don't miss any fun and start download Lucky Pusher Spin!
